## DataAdapter.list() method

Retrieve a list of all files and folders inside the given folder, non-recursive.

**Signature:**

```typescript
list(normalizedPath: string): Promise<ListedFiles>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>normalizedPath</code> | <code>string</code> | path to folder, use [normalizePath()](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/normalizePath.md) to normalize beforehand. |

**Returns:**

`Promise``<`[`ListedFiles`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/ListedFiles.md)`>`
